item.name: slackbot
item.message:
Announcement! *You can now ask me Slack-related questions — and I'll respond.* If I don't understand (I'm only a bot, after all), I'll search Slack's <https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us|Help Center>.
*But wait — there's more!* Wondering where to jot personal notes, if not here? *Now you can send direct messages to yourself.* Lovely for listing to-dos, drafting messages, or pasting important links. Just select the plus sign (*+*) next to the direct messages list, and search for your own name. :tada:

item.name: slackbot
item.message: If you get lost and want some more help, look at our <https://ssec-metobs.slack.com/help|Help Center> or our <https://ssec-metobs.slack.com/getting-started/users#channels|guide to getting started on Slack>. Otherwise, have a lovely day :wave:
